page.title: 06TRANSPORT:TRAINS
page.content: The{electrified}line goes south to {Crewe},where it joins another line to go to London. To the north it goes to {Stockport}and{Manchester}.The local services travel between Crewe, Manchester and{Altrincham.}These trains run approximately every 10 minutes. Inter_city trains also travel along the line and for the convenience of local residents several stop at{Wilmslow.}The expresses have around 11 carriages and the local services 3 or 4 coaches. Our survey shows that{more people use {their own cars than travel by bus or {train.}In order to attract more custom the local bus services and British Rail offer several forms of {cheap travel.}For example{young {people,senior citizens}and the {disabled}may obtain cheap travel cards.
